trans-unit.target: Ajouter à la liste de lecture

Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to close the current tab
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to copy the URL of the current tab to clipboard
String describing the action of opening the last added bookmark from the home screen Quick Actions via 3D Touch
String describing the action of opening the last tab sent to Firefox from the home screen Quick Actions via 3D Touch
Accessibility label, associated to the 3D Touch action on the current tab in the tab tray, used to display a larger preview of the tab.
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to send the current tab to another device
'After 1 hour' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 1 minute' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 5 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 10 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 15 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
Label used as a setting item and title of the following screen to change the current passcode
Title of the dialog used to request the passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
Text displayed above the input field when entering a new passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
Label for the Face ID/Passcode item in Settings
'Immediately' interval item for selecting when to require passcode

trans-unit.target: Code d’accès incorrect. Veuillez réessayer (Essais restants : %d).
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app with attempts remaining
Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.target: Nombre maximum d’essais atteint. Veuillez réessayer dans une heure.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Nombre maximum d’essais atteint. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.source: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.target: Le nouveau code d’accès doit être différent du code actuel.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user tries to enter the same passcode as their existing code when changing it.
Label for the Passcode item in Settings

trans-unit.target: Les codes d’accès ne correspondent pas. Veuillez réessayer.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed to user when their confirming passcode doesn't match the first code.

trans-unit.target: Saisir à nouveau le code d’accès
trans-unit.note: Text displayed above the input field when confirming a passcode
Text displayed in the 'Interval' section, followed by the current interval setting, e.g. 'Immediately'
Title of the dialog used to set a passcode
Label for the Touch ID/Passcode item in Settings
Label used as a setting item to turn off passcode
Label used as a setting item to turn on passcode
Touch ID prompt subtitle when turning off passcode
List section title for when to use Face ID
List section title for when to use Touch ID

trans-unit.id: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez votre empreinte digitale pour accéder aux identifiants.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing logins

trans-unit.id: Use your fingerprint to access Private Browsing now.
trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access Private Browsing now.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez votre empreinte digitale pour accéder à la navigation privée.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing private browsing

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to disable Touch ID.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez votre empreinte digitale pour désactiver Touch ID.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when disabling Touch ID

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access configuring your required passcode interval.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez votre empreinte digitale pour pouvoir configurer l’intervalle de demande du code d’accès.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing the require passcode setting
Action button for deleting bookmarks in the bookmarks panel.
The folder name for the virtual folder that contains all desktop bookmarks.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?
trans-unit.target: Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer ce répertoire et son contenu ?
trans-unit.note: Main body of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
Button label to cancel deletion when the user tried to delete a non-empty folder.
Button label for the button that deletes a folder and all of its children.
Title of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
The cancel button when confirming clear history.
The button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.source: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: L’historique sera effacé de vos appareils connectés. Cette action est irréversible.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.
The confirmation button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.source: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.target: Effacer l’historique de votre compte Firefox ?
trans-unit.note: Title of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.source: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.target: Cette action effacera l’ensemble de vos données personnelles, y compris l’historique de vos appareils synchronisés.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.
Settings item for clearing browsing history
Settings item for clearing the cache
Button in settings that clears private data for the selected items. Navigation title in settings.
Settings item for clearing cookies
Settings item for clearing website data
Settings item for clearing passwords and login data
The cancel button when confirming clear private data.
The button that clears private data.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data. It cannot be undone.
trans-unit.source: This action will clear all of your private data. It cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Cette action effacera l’ensemble de vos données personnelles et est irréversible.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear their private data.
Shown in error pages for files that can't be shown and need to be downloaded.
Shown in error pages on a button that will try to load the page again
Done button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Text selection menu item
Accessibility label for next result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Accessibility label for previous result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Action button for deleting history entries in the history panel.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Ceci vous permet de prendre des photos et de les envoyer.

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Les sites web que vous visitez peuvent demander à connaître votre emplacement.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Ceci vous permet de prendre des vidéos et de les envoyer.
Ceci vous permet d’enregistrer des photos.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Ceci vous permet d’enregistrer des photos et de les envoyer.

trans-unit.id: Browse multiple Web pages at the same time with tabs.
trans-unit.source: Browse multiple Web pages at the same time with tabs.
trans-unit.target: Naviguez sur plusieurs pages web à la fois grâce aux onglets.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1T8gxwo

trans-unit.id: Connect Firefox everywhere you use it.
trans-unit.source: Connect Firefox everywhere you use it.
trans-unit.target: Connectez Firefox partout où vous l’utilisez.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1T8gxwo

trans-unit.source: Use any email app — not just Mail — with Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez n’importe quelle application de courrier électronique (et pas uniquement Mail) avec Firefox.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Mail' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Plus de choix pour vos courriels
trans-unit.note: Title for the fourth panel 'Mail' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Tap the mask icon to slip into Private Browsing mode.
trans-unit.target: Appuyez sur l’icône de masque pour passer en mode de navigation privée.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Private Browsing' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Naviguez comme si personne ne vous regardait
trans-unit.note: Title for the third panel 'Private Browsing' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose another default search engine (or add your own) in Settings.
trans-unit.target: Vous recherchez quelque chose de différent ? Choisissez un autre moteur de recherche par défaut (ou ajoutez le vôtre) dans les paramètres.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Use Sync to find the bookmarks, passwords, and other things you save to Firefox on all your devices.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez Sync pour accéder aux marque-pages, mots de passe et autres données que vous conservez dans Firefox sur vos autres appareils.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Sync' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Pick up where you left off
trans-unit.target: Reprenez là où vous en étiez
trans-unit.note: Title for the fifth panel 'Sync' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: A modern mobile browser from Mozilla, the non-profit committed to a free and open web.
trans-unit.target: Un navigateur mobile et moderne par Mozilla, l’organisation à but non lucratif qui s’engage à défendre un Web libre et ouvert.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.
String spoken by assistive technology (like VoiceOver) stating on which page of the intro wizard we currently are. E.g. Introductory slide 1 of 3

trans-unit.id: Personalize your Firefox just the way you like in Settings.

Button for smaller reader font size. Keep this extremely short! This is shown in the reader mode toolbar.

trans-unit.id: A username and password are being requested by %@.

trans-unit.target: Le site %@ demande un nom d’utilisateur et un mot de passe.

trans-unit.id: A username and password are being requested by %@. The site says: %@
trans-unit.source: A username and password are being requested by %1$@. The site says: %2$@
trans-unit.target: Le site %1$@ demande un nom d’utilisateur et un mot de passe. Le site indique : %2$@
trans-unit.note: Authentication prompt message with a realm. First parameter is the hostname. Second is the realm string
Button for reader mode font size. Keep this extremely short! This is shown in the reader mode toolbar.

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it’s already there?

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.target: Voulez-vous enregistrer le mot de passe pour %1$@ sur %2$@ ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.target: Voulez-vous enregistrer le mot de passe utilisé sur %@ ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password with no username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to update the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to update the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.target: Voulez-vous mettre à jour le mot de passe pour %1$@ sur %2$@ ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for updating a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to update the password on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to update the password on %@?
trans-unit.target: Voulez-vous mettre à jour le mot de passe utilisé sur %@ ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for updating a password with on username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.
Done button on left side of the Settings view controller title bar
Used as a button label for crash dialog prompt
The label of the button the user will press to reject the option to open a file in another application
The label of the button the user will press to be presented with a list of other apps to open a file in

trans-unit.source: Firefox is unable to download or display this file. Would you like to open it in another app?
trans-unit.target: Firefox ne parvient pas à télécharger ou afficher ce fichier. Souhaitez-vous l’ouvrir avec une autre application ?
trans-unit.note: The message of the alert box asking the user if they want to use another app to open a file.
The title of the alert box asking the user if they want to use another app to open a file.

trans-unit.source: Downloads aren’t supported in Firefox yet.
trans-unit.target: Les téléchargements ne sont pas encore pris en charge par Firefox.

trans-unit.target: Saisissez votre mot de passe pour vous connecter.
trans-unit.note: Text message in the settings table view
Label for button to perform advanced actions on the error page

trans-unit.source: Warning: we can’t confirm your connection to this website is secure.
trans-unit.target: Attention : nous ne pouvons garantir que la connexion à ce site est sécurisée.
trans-unit.note: Warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: It may be a misconfiguration or tampering by an attacker. Proceed if you accept the potential risk.
trans-unit.target: Il peut s’agir d’une erreur de configuration ou d’une tentative d’attaque. Poursuivez en ayant conscience du risque encouru.
trans-unit.note: Additional warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: The owner of %@ has configured their website improperly. To protect your information from being stolen, Firefox has not connected to this website.
trans-unit.target: Les propriétaires de %@ ont mal configuré leur site. Pour éviter que vos données ne soient dérobées, Firefox ne s’est pas connecté à ce site.

Title on the certificate error page
